Reviews.Title: GOOD BUT I NEED A NEW CHARGER ASAP
Reviews.Author: tara tudela
Reviews.Content: the phone is good it works connection internet connection calling texting all perfect except for one thing the charger was horrible it didn't wanna charge the phone and now the phone is dead for 2 whole days I really need a new charger for this phone

Reviews.Title: Workd Well :-)
Reviews.Author: Andriy
Reviews.Content: Good phone. Works well. The price is a little bit high for me. This phone is not for everyone, but i like it.

Reviews.Title: SUCKS
Reviews.Author: Shavonda Williams
Reviews.Content: BUTTONS WOULDN'T WORK WITHOUT BEATING IT.  CHARGER PORT STOPPED CHARGING. PHONE WOULD RING BUT YOU COULDN'T ANSWER BECAUSE THE BUTTONS WERE HARD TO PUSH.  POINT BLANK...SAVE YOUR MONEY

Reviews.Title: Apple charger
Reviews.Author: Eveline
Reviews.Content: Maybe try using a iPhone 5 and so one charger, it looks like they want it looking the same.... soo

Reviews.Title: NO!NO!NO!

Reviews.Content: This phone sucks a knock off iPhone please don't waste your time or money and it takes forever to receive.

Reviews.Title: sucks so much!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: It sucks. Do not buy!! Its not worth the money and it doesn't come with the stuff it said it did its a tip off!!

Reviews.Title: this phone is too slow, poor quality and the camara sucks really bad
Reviews.Author: Jennifer mercado
Reviews.Content: I hate it ! wouldn't want anyone to get this ! this phone is too slow, poor quality and the camera sucks really bad

Reviews.Title: H5 Summary
Reviews.Author: LTahnya Canty
Reviews.Content: I think that this phone is great. This phone is great, but the charger is the worst. The charger is not charging the phone and my phone has been dead for 72 hours= 3 whole days!!! It's like the charger hates its partner ,the phone!!  I really love this phone ,but the charger should be replaced with a different charger!

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Hannah "Hannah"
Reviews.Content: Just like the IPhone 5s just cheaper! But it dose not have the Apple symbol on it which kinda sucks!

Reviews.Title: multiple things wrong!
Reviews.Author: Katelyn
Reviews.Content: First off the phone is white and it clearly says black! Also the back easily falls off! It's a piece of crap!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: John Owens
Reviews.Content: It looks like the I phone and it can fit into one of the original iPhone otter boxes which helps in my line of work. I've had no problems what so ever with this phone I bought 2 of them now.

Reviews.Title: never again!
Reviews.Author: ernest
Reviews.Content: the worse phone ever.! nothing worked  really sorry pic quality none of the apps work! 100 % boot leg lol!

Reviews.Title: I did not like it the picture is a trick
Reviews.Author: Darnea
Reviews.Content: The phone was getting stuck. It has no app store. The front and back camera it to dark. I can go on and on.!

Reviews.Title: sucked
Reviews.Author: sara corbin
Reviews.Content: I returned it and I should have my money back. The phone simply did not work! The keys pressed were printing wrong. The screen was distorted. Major hassle returning and still have not received a refund.

Reviews.Title: Omg!
Reviews.Author: jayda jackson
Reviews.Content: This is the worst phone ever. It's made of all plastic, the screen darkens randomly and flickers ! Also you have to push the button down hard just to select something . NOTHING like an iPhone ! So the description is a lie. It doesn't have an App Store and Ive been trying to contact the seller but they haven't answered my emails so I guess they don't want to refund me ! The phone sucks . Amazon should not allow this for sale . I wish I could rate it 0 stars !

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Craig McDonald
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone last year for my daughter who is currently living in Jamaica. The phone is no good as far as I am concerned and I should have tested it before taking it to her in Jamaica when I went on my vacation. From the very first moment the phone battery did not last an hour after the first initial charging process. Then it stated to freeze. It would not accept the Digicel sim card that they use in Jamaica and we had to take it to the Digicel office to have them fix that. I remained hopeful and my daughter did not want to part with the phone although it will never remained charged for more than a couple minutes even after been placed on charge for hours. I left it down there with promises to get her a replacement when I returned to the USA. The phone started to overheat so badly on her that her mother refused to let her use it anymore in fear that it may hurt her. It was sent back to me recently and now I am stuck with it and have lost my money. No one wants to purchase it even for parts and now I am hoping to sell it on EBay. I am very disappointed in this product and would never recommend anyone to these phones or attempt to purchase another of this kind. This is my second most disappointed product experience with purchasing a product on amazon. This is very unfortunate to know that I lost my money in such a hard economy that we are presently living in. I didn't even want to give this product the one star rating to show how disappointed I am with this product. I hope that they (Amazon) takes this off their website as it only makes Amazon look bad although not liable for the quality of this product, it still reflects on the company and the products and services offered.

Reviews.Title: Sucks
Reviews.Author: ted
Reviews.Content: I bought dis and it broke in a week...its super slow... cant download on it....dis product sucks i wouldn't recommend this.

Reviews.Title: I like dealing with Amazon.com
Reviews.Author: truman jano
Reviews.Content: Thanks,  this item works awesome and looking forward for some more brand new electronics with low low prices. In the futureI thinks I am going to order some clothing for men and women.

Reviews.Title: Don't waiste your money
Reviews.Author: Ljp
Reviews.Content: I throw it right in the garbage you can't take pictures everything it's slow not a good purchase do not buy it...
